Name: Sea of Dreams
About the game: “Prepare yourself for a pleasant stay aboard the Sea of Dreams. An iconic journey on the theme of the 1940s.”. This is what you may have read before getting on the boat. But as you can imagine. This is not going to go as planned. You wake up alone aboard the boat named the Sea of Dream. Strange things happen. Baggage everywhere, traces of blood. But no one. You are alone. Your goal is simple, find help. For this, you will have to explore the ship and solve puzzles in order to move forward. And maybe understand what happened. Features: 2D exploring game with top view camera Exploration Puzzles Paranormal Story Will you survive the Sea of Dreams? Find a way to escape from this dream that has turned into a nightmare.
